name: The Lightbringers
description:
The Lightbringers is a classic retro RPG featuring a party of characters engulfed in an epic adventure.

STORY:


The world is being ravaged by an evil disease known as The Plague, join four chosen heroes on their quest to become the Lightbringers, the only ones capable of eradicating the disease and saving the humankind and their own loved ones!

FEATURES:


  • Classic Storyline.
  • Dynamic Party System.
  • Fun & Witty Dialogues.
  • Dozens of accessories to customize your players.
